page.title: 13Local News
page.content: The Closing of the Old Melin School. I was in the second form when we were first told we would be leaving the old Melin school.We were going to move to Hengwrt Primary School because the roof over Mrs.Maddocks's room caved in and so the building was unsafe.The County Architect spotted some Dry Rot on the roof.The Education Committee informed us that we would be moving to Hengwrt in May.When we were told this all the children stayed away from school for four days.Mr.Oates(the headmaster)had a very hard job of sorting out all the things we would be bringing to Hengwrt.When we were in Hengwrt bulldozers moved into the old Melin school site to demolish the school. Our new school will hopefully be open in January 1986.
